name: FetchPhoneNumber
description: Fetch the Inbound Processing Region assigned to a phone number.

PhoneNumber.description: The phone number in E.164 format

$ul: **account_sid**: The unique SID identifier of the Account.
**date_created**: The date that this phone number was assigned an Inbound Processing Region, given in ISO 8601 format.
**date_updated**: The date that the Inbound Processing Region was updated for this phone number, given in ISO 8601 format.
**friendly_name**: A human readable description of the Inbound Processing Region assignments for this phone number, up to 64 characters.
**phone_number**: The phone number in E.164 format
**sid**: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies the Inbound Processing Region assignments for this phone number.
**url**: The absolute URL of the resource.
**voice_region**: The Inbound Processing Region used for this phone number for voice.
